articles.author: Veronica Stracqualursi, CNN
articles.title: Federal judge says deadline to ratify ERA 'expired long ago' in setback to advocates' efforts
articles.description: A federal district judge on Friday dealt Equal Rights Amendment advocates a blow in ruling that the deadline to ratify the ERA "expired long ago" and three states' recent ratifications of the amendment "came too late to count."

articles.title: Asian American man attacked and robbed amid disturbing trend
articles.description: A 67-year-old victim was attacked and robbed in San Francisco. It's the latest in a series of assaults against Asian Americans that have spiked during the Covid-19 pandemic across the US.

articles.title: Schumer takes a swipe at McConnell following Senate's vote
articles.description: Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer addresses the media following the Senate's vote to pass the $1.9 trillion Covid relief package

articles.author: Analysis by Harry Enten, CNN
articles.title: How the Covid-19 hesitant population is declining rapidly
articles.description: The release of Johnson & Johnson's Covid-19 vaccine and its partnership with Merck means that President Joe Biden expects the US to have enough Covid-19 vaccines delivered to cover every adult by the end of May.

articles.title: Italian prosecutor asks for life sentence for two Americans charged with police murder
articles.description: An Italian prosecutor on Saturday asked for life sentences for two American students charged with murdering a police officer in an alleged drug deal gone wrong.

articles.author: Faith Karimi, CNN
articles.title: Three dads, a baby and the legal battle to get their names added to a birth certificate
articles.description: A polyamorous household in California is part of a unique and very modern family that includes three dads, two toddlers, two surrogates and one egg donor.
articles.content:
With a third voice at the table, our conversations about parenting began to change. We just didn't have the ovaries.
Ian Jenkins
